page.title: 17Politics
page.content: Our area has 5 political parties namely Labour, Liberal, S.D.P., & Plaid Cymru. We have 4 levels of government, Community, District & County Councils each elected every 4 years and Parliament elected every 5 years. The Labour Party usually controls this area. The Mayor of Lliw Valley, a resident of Alltwen, was a former teacher in Alltwen Primary School. We had a County Council election on May 8th.and people eligible to vote received a voting card to take to their local polling station when going to vote. The polling station was open from 08.00 until 21.00 in order to give people ample opportunity to vote. 42% of the eligible population voted that day and a Labour candidate was chosen.
